reviews.name: 24oz All-Surface Cleaner GG0003
reviews.reviewText: Out of all the Granite Gold products that I have tried so fair the All-Surface cleaner has got to be my top favorite. It really does a wonderful job of cleaning of spots from my counters and leaving them shinny clean.
reviews.title: Granite All Surface Cleaner

reviews.name: 24oz All-Surface Cleaner GG0003
reviews.reviewText: I love the All Surface Cleaner by Granite Gold. It truly is a wonderful ALL SURFACE cleaner and it is that all surfaces! I have used many cleaners in the past that claim they are all surface and they are not. With this the residues are wiped out and the best of allâ€¦no streaking! The surface are left clean and sparkling and there are NO harsh chemical smells. Another fantastic product by Granite Gold!
reviews.title: Granite Gold All Surface Cleaner!!

reviews.name: 24oz All-Surface Cleaner GG0003
reviews.reviewText:
This all surface cleaner is the only one that you need. It works all over the house and has a light subtle smell.
It comes in a bottle with a nozzle so all you have to do is spray and clean.
It works great in the kitchen on the sinks, countertops, stove and even inside the fridge!! When you are done in there head straight to the bathroom cause it is safe to use in there too!!! I am exchanging this one product for 3 others that I was using.
reviews.title: Awesome Product

reviews.name: 24oz All-Surface Cleaner GG0003
reviews.reviewText: I received this wonderful cleaning product to test for free from Granite Gold and I am so thrilled I was chosen to try it! It is wonderful, it cleans so many surfaces and leaves them shining with a lovely, pleasant scent, that makes me feel like a great housewife, proud that my family and friends know that my home is clean. It is a all natural cleaner so I cant relax that my family it safe from harmful toxic 's that would invade my home, making me feel smart and helping having the best clean, safe home I can give them, buy it, I would and will when my bottle is gone! Yes I forget to add that is handy, to only use one product instead of three or more saving you time and money too!
reviews.title: I Best All purpose cleaner!

reviews.name: 24oz All-Surface Cleaner GG0003
reviews.reviewText: I love the fact that this product really does work on all my surfaces in the house. It cleans my kitchen counters, then lets me get the stove top, fingerprints on the fridge, and even any minor spots on the floor. Or if I need to do the bathroom this product has everything covered with no problems. I've even used it on some glass windows!
reviews.title: Love the All Surface Cleaning Ability
